name: WC Related Products Slider By Endroit
author: Pawan Priyadarshi

sections.description:
Adding an advanced related product slider on your product pages increases sales due to customer interest on your e-commerce website.
Main features of this plugin are below-
* You can select any number of related products on your product page.
* Enable/Disable Slider.
* Select related products by Tags & Categories.
* Choose related products by popularity, frequently bought together and machine learning algorithm to display the best related products in the PRO version.

Coming soon
* Related Products by Custom fields
* (Got more ideas? Tell me!)

Buy PRO Version- (https://endroit.in/product/endroit-related-product-slider-for-woocommerce/)
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Settings->Plugin Name screen to configure the plugin
sections.faq:
Does it work with woocommerce?

Yes, It works with woocommerce.

How can I get support for this plugin if there is an issue?

Please share your issue with screenshots and we will try to resolve the issues within 2-3 business days.

How can I donate for this plugin?

Please Donate on my PayPal link- https://paypal.me/PawanPriyadarshi?locale.x=en_GB

short_description: Show related products on your product page by tags, categories, frequenty bought together, popularity, machine learning.
